venue.name: Roger Williams University - Global Heritage Hall - Atrium

item.description:
Join Val for a show if her student's work at Roger Williams! Whether you're a graphic designer or not, it doesn't matter. Let them know what you think!

Stop by at any time during the showcase hours, just like MNMs come early or come late. There will be a hearty reception of sweet and savory items to partake of as well.

After the show, join Val at Thames Waterside in Bristol from 8-10pm for a little socializing, and then head back to PVD for some 80's dancing at Local 121!

Sounds like a great Friday Night!

Please note in your RSVP where you plan on meeting the group, so she can look for you!
item.how_to_find_us: Val is hosting this one, please look at her picture!
item.name: Adventures in Bristol and back to PVD, starting at RWU
